downloadTitle: Microsoft Streets and Trips 2009 and MapPoint 2009 Construction Data Update
downloadDescription: Download the latest construction data to keep your maps current.
detailsSection: Download the latest road construction data to keep your Streets and Trips and MapPoint 2009 maps current.
installInstructionSection:
1. Close Streets & Trips and/or MapPoint.
  2. Click the download link to start the download.
  3. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  4. Save the file in the Data folder
    • For XP
      C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Microsoft\Microsoft Streets & Trips\16.0\Data
      or
      C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Microsoft\Microsoft MapPoint\16.0\Data
    • For Vista
      C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Microsoft Streets & Trips\16.0\Data
      or
      C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Microsoft MapPoint\16.0\Data
  5. Restart Streets & Trips and/or MapPoint.
